B

BISHOP - Variable in class rules.Piece
The identifier for bishops
BLACK - Variable in class rules.Piece
The colour/side identifier for black pieces
BLACK_K_SIDE_CASTLING - Static variable in class rules.Move
 
black_k_side_castling_allowed - Variable in class rules.Position
A flag describing the future availability of white's castling queenside.
BLACK_Q_SIDE_CASTLING - Static variable in class rules.Move
 
black_q_side_castling_allowed - Variable in class rules.Position
A flag describing the future availability of black's castling queenside.
Board - Class in rules
the board of the game
Board() - Constructor for class rules.Board
Constructs a board with the right pieces in its starting positions
